health.j:name: Mental health
health.j:description: Mental health encompasses emotional, psychological, and social well-being, influencing cognition, perception, and behavior.
health.j:name: Blood
health.j:description: Haematological diseases, anaemia, clotting (including thromboses and venous embolisms) and normal development and function of platelets and erythrocytes
